Text.Name: NpcFight_SneakValue
Text.Desc: The extent to which the character is hidden while stealthed. The higher this number, the more difficult it is to detect the character.

Text.Name: PotentialOfBasepracticeAddValue
Text.Desc: A character's Potential influences the speed of Foundation Training and the efficiency with which Qi is refined.

Text.Desc: A character's Condemnation Bonus

Text.Desc: The Bonus of an Inner Cauldron Limit

Text.Desc: Foundation Training speed of outer disciples.

Text.Name: DeepPracticeSpeedSpecialCoefficient
Text.Desc: Cultivation speed gained by Golden Core Cultivators.

Text.Desc: Base Mental State of inner disciples.

Text.Name: SpeedOfMindStateCoefficient
Text.Desc: Speed at which the metal state of inner disciples change.

Text.DisplayName: Mood affects the speed at which Mental State changes

Text.Name: SpeedOfMindStateCoefficientByMoods_Easy
Text.DisplayName: Mood affects the speed at which Mental State changes

Text.Name: InspirationCoefficient
Text.Desc: The higher a person's Intelligence, the easier it is for them to comprehend things in life.

Text.Desc: The Base Qi value of a cultivator.

Text.Desc: Character's Max Qi.

Text.Desc: Item quality bonus when crafting artifacts.

Text.Desc: Base success rate when crafting artifacts.

Text.Desc: The speed, based on Alchemy skill, at which elixirs can be concocted.

Text.Desc: Additional Concoction speed bonus when concocting elixirs.

Text.Name: DanMake_SuccessRate
Text.Desc: Success rate, based on Alchemy skill, when concocting elixirs.

Text.Desc: Additional bonus to success rate when concocting elixirs.

Text.Name: DanMake_Yield
Text.Desc: Yield bonus granted by Alchemy skill when concocting elixirs.

Text.Desc: Additional yield bonus for when concocting elixirs.

Text.Desc: bonus success rate when breakthroughing.

Text.Desc: Maximum fly speed when adventuring.

Text.Desc: Maximum flying speed bonus when adventuring.

Text.Desc: Time multiplier for performing a Breakthrough during adventure.

Text.Desc: Time left in order to perform a Breakthrough.

Text.Name: EsotericaNum
Text.Desc: The maximum amount of manuals.

Text.Name: AbilityLvAddV
Text.Desc: The actual Attainment bonus value.

Text.Name: ExperiencePrestigeAddP
Text.Desc: Bonus multiplier for reputation acquisition for adventures.

Text.Name: ExperienceFindSpeedAddV
Text.Desc: Speed bonus when exploring a new area during an adventure.

Text.Desc: Stamina conversion rate for each point of satiety.
